title: How to use RP
body: Hi, i am level 28 and am really new to this whole lol group chat, so I really don't know what to do but I just want to know how to use my 3500 RP that I just recently bought..... Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Also brosporo can i friend you in LOL, k bye
{{summoner:31}}

If you were wondering about how to actually use the RP, you can go into the shop and purchase anything that requires RP from there.

If you're actually asking for suggestions on WHAT to buy with it, you should post that kind of question over in General Discussion where more people will see it ^_^!
Thank you, I will post it too general discussion but the problem is that I don't know how to get there?
